column1: SA1 Personal Income Summary: Personal Income, Population, Per Capita Personal Income
1/ Census Bureau midyear population estimate. Estimates for 2010-2017 reflect Census Bureau midyear state population estimates available as of December 2017.
2/ Per capita personal income is total personal income divided by total midyear population.
Note-- All dollar estimates are in current dollars (not adjusted for inflation).
Last updated: March 22, 2018-- new estimates for 2017; revised estimates for 2010-2016.
